original_title: Black Veil Brides: Alive and Burning
overview: Filmed at The Wiltern, Los Angeles. November 1, 2014 Set includes many hits, and 3 songs off of Black Veil Bride's newest self-titled album. Featuring Andy Biersack (vocals) Ashley Purdy (bass) Christian (CC) Coma (drums) Jake Pitts (Lead guitar) Jeremy (Jinxx) Ferguson
title: Black Veil Brides: Alive and Burning
